15 Days of New Year Web Hosting Discounts | Upto Flat 50% & 25% off | 1-15th Jan only

Webhosting.uk.com (WHUK), a UK based web hosting company since 2001 with a successful business in the web hosting Industry, provides one of the most efficient Linux and Windows based vps hosting packages with Free End User Support. The platform offers the best experience alike a dedicated platform but at an affordable price due to its shared environment. WHUK’s 24x7 free support has been a key differentiators.

>> Use the following discount coupons to earn a discount on new Linux & Windows VPS Plans:-

Use the code VMSAVE25 for 25% off on 24 months billing cycle
Use the code VMSAVE20 for 20% off on 12 months billing cycle
Use the code VMSAVE15 for 15% off on 6 months billing cycle
Use the code VMSAVE10 for 10% off on 3 months billing cycle

To compare the plans, please visit : Linux Virtual hosting and Windows Virtual Servers

The Flat 50% off on Reseller Hosting plans have also been extended until the 15th January 2013

>> Use the coupon Reseller2012 to avail a flat discount of 50% on all reseller hosting packages.

The main highlights of the reseller hosting plans include:
• Free billing software
• Free domain reseller account
• Free end user support and
• Private name servers
• Unlimited Domain & Email Hosting Capability

To compare plans, please visit Linux reseller hosting & Windows Reseller plans.

These discounts are an extension to the Christmas discount sale, to check the best deals on other web hosting services, please visit : Seasons Discounts by WHUK

In case you have any questions, you can contact our sales department by initiating a chat or by dropping an email to sales @ webhosting.uk.com or call us on 0808-262-0855 / +44-191-303-8069. You may even choose to request us to call you back by filling a simple form found here.

About Webhosting.UK.com :
Established in the Year 2001, Webhosting.UK.Com Limited offers a wide array of value for money web hosting services including Linux/Windows Shared Hosting, Reseller Hosting, Cloud Hosting, Virtual Private Servers (VPS), Semi-Dedicated Servers, Dedicated Servers, SSL and Offsite Backup Solutions. 24x7x365 technical support and 99.95% uptime guarantee is offered as standard with their UK-based servers.
